Text: Enfolio Master PS AgreementAs I explained to you Reliant Services Inc and Enron North America Corp finally executed the Enfolio Master Firm PurchaseSale Agreement I thought it would be easier to use that Agreement as a base for our Agreement between Enron North American Corp and Reliant Energy Services Canada Ltd I took the liberty of making a few modifications to accommodate the Canadian transactions Please let me know your thoughts Thanks See attached file Enron and RESC doc Enron and RESC doc

Re Enfolio Master PS AgreementPlease forward it to us so we can review it and give you our thoughts Thank you so much on AM To cc Subject Re Enfolio Master PS Agreement Thanks for your email regarding a master with Reliant Energy Services Canada Ltd ENA has a Canadian form of contract we could work with which will have most of your changes already contained If we use the US master there are problems with provisions regarding taxes arbitration etc so I would like to suggest we use the Canadian form with your changes as needed Please let me have your thoughts Regards Debra Perlingiere Enron North America Corp Legal Department Smith Street EB Houston Texas Phone Fax
